remarks: Swapping the points defining a line keeps it unchanged.  Part of Theorem 4.11 of [Schwabhauser] p. 34.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Apr-2019.)
statement:
tglngval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglngval.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tglngval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglngval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tglngval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
tglngval.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
tgcolg.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. P ) $.
colrot $e |- ( ph -> ( Z e. ( X L Y ) \/ X = Y ) ) $.
colcom $p |- ( ph -> ( Z e. ( Y L X ) \/ Y = X ) ) $.
